T02TD3338E:28a-1: kha di ra ba na t'a r'a s'a dha nam /
T02TD3338E:28a-3: seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD3338E:28a-4: bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3338E:28a-5: sngon du bstan pa'i cho gas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas pa'i rjes la stong pa nyid du byas la /
T02TD3338E:28a-6: de la sngon gyi gnas su padma dang zla ba la /
T02TD3338E:28a-7: t'am gi sa bon yongs su gyur pa las autpa la lte bar t'am gis mtshan pa'o //
T02TD3338E:28a-8: de yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid sgrol ma ljang gu don yod grub pa'i dbu rgyan can /
T02TD3338E:28a-9: mchog sbyin dang autpa la g-yas dang g-yon pa'i phyag na'o //
T02TD3338E:28a-10: mya ngan med pa'i shing gi 'od zer can dang /
T02TD3338E:28a-11: ral gcig ma gnyis g-yas dang g-yon gyi phyogs kyi cha na gnas pa ste /
T02TD3338E:28a-12: mdzes pa'i gzhon nu ma rgyan gyis brgyan ma /
T02TD3338E:28a-13: seng ldeng gi nags su sna tshogs pa'i sems can gyi don byed par bsams la /
T02TD3338E:28a-14: ye shes sems ma dang gcig tu byas te /
T02TD3338E:28a-15: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
T02TD3338E:28a-16: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi bzlas pa byas la de nyid kyi yid kyis ji ltar bde bas gnas par bya'o //
T02TD3338E:28a-17: seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa rdzogs so //
T02TD3338E:28a-18: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang lo ts'a ba dge slong khams pa ba ris bsgyur ba'o//
